name: Nerdy Ben Foot Doctor - 10 ways to fix the Geek
name_original: Nerdy Ben Foot Doctor - 10 ways to fix the Geek
description:
Our sweet geeky little hero Ben needs your special care and Doctor skills!

After saving loads of people on his secret boy missions he has returned with very sore achey feet, and my what a mess he's in, looks like he had quite an adventure!

Poor Ben, lets make him feel better, now there's 10 ways to fix our hero and that’s all down to you Little Doctor! Bring him straight to the Foot Spa Salon and settle him in a comfy chair with his feet up.

You'll know what to do, wash his tired and dirty feet with your water jet and sooth his hurts with your healing sponge. Use the hygiene foot spa to tackle all the nasty germs and cure his grazes with the smallest injection.

After a lovely frothy wash with the soap bar and a scattering of plasters, gently remove all the pine needles with your tweezers, just shake your device and hey presto..all gone.

Ben is starting to feel better, once you have done his feet, back and front, he will be as good as new and ready for more special boy missions to save the world!
